name: No Lift No Gift
description:
"Krampus rearranged Santa Claus' presents for lovely children! We don't have much time. Sort boxes by their color, using your strong arms, so joy of may be brought back! Enjoy candies... and avoid dynamites(?)."

Simple game about sorting boxes made for Yogscast Game Jam (theme: 'GIVING').
Give me your word about this game, so I can make your improve your experimence!

Have fun and Merry Christmas!
